comment._content: Marie Gräfin zu Castell-Rüdenhausen (1864-1942). Please see Princesses Maria & Juliana of Stolberg-Werningen (LOC) | Flickr - Photo Sharing! and Marie, Countess of Castell-Rüdenhausen and her daughter Princess Juliane of Stolberg-Werningen | Grand Ladies | gogm as well.

comment._content: yes, same lady pictured in (there identified as Maria), and same issue about her not being a princess, but a countess and Stolberg-Wernigerode vs. Stolberg-Werningen.
